title: Crash: "fatal error: concurrent map iteration and map write"
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: erigon version 2.54.0
OS & Version: Linux
Commit hash: v2.54.0 tag in Git

Erigon Command (with flags/config):
```
/nix/store/34w21dxq24602c0znlvp4qyqj1i61ldf-erigon-2.54.0/bin/erigon --datadir %S/erigon-XXXXX \
--authrpc.addr 127.0.0.1 --authrpc.jwtsecret /mydatadir/jwt.hex --authrpc.port XXXX \
--authrpc.timeouts.idle 2m0s --authrpc.timeouts.read 30s --authrpc.timeouts.write 30m0s \
--authrpc.vhosts localhost --chain mainnet --http.addr 127.0.0.1 --http.api net,eth \
--http.port XXXX --http.timeouts.idle 2m0s --http.timeouts.read 30s --http.timeouts.write 30m0s \
--http.vhosts localhost --metrics.addr 0.0.0.0 --metrics --metrics.port XXXXX --port XXXXX \
--private.api.addr 127.0.0.1:XXXX --private.api.ratelimit 31872 --snapshots \
--torrent.port XXXXX '--datadir=/mydatadir/' '--p2p.allowed-ports=XXXXX,XXXXX' '--nat=stun' \
'--prune=htc' '--prune.r.before=11052984'
```
Consensus Layer: Nimbus
Consensus Layer Command (with flags/config): 
```
/nix/store/d9zwxi8k6whnhm7l9dirp86wbwjy4cl0-nimbus-eth2-23.10.1/bin/nimbus_beacon_node \
--tcp-port=XXXXX --network=mainnet --jwt-secret=/XXX/jwt.hex  --udp-port=XXXXX '--data-dir=/XXXX/nimbus' \
'--el=http://localhost:XXXX' '--enr-auto-update' '--metrics' '--metrics-port=XXXXX' '--metrics-address=0.0.0.0' \
'--rest' '--rest-port=XXXX' '--suggested-fee-recipient=0xYYYYYYYYY' '--doppelganger-detection=off' \
'--history=prune' '--web3-signer-url=http://XXXX:YYYY' '--payload-builder-url=http://XXXXX:YYY' \
'--payload-builder=true'
```
Chain/Network: Mainnet
#### Expected behaviour
Don't crash

#### Actual behaviour
Crash

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
Unclear.

#### Backtrace
Attached as file.
[erigon-crash-2023-12-21.txt](https://github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/files/13759588/erigon-crash-2023-12-21.txt)
